thread.title: Jamie Kennedy
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Jamie Kennedy

author: Jamie Kennedy
title: Jamie Kennedy
text: As a return customer many times over my experience was the same as always, great. I'm a very particular about what I want and what I'm looking for and I always find it there. I appreciate the patients of all the sales associates that worked with me. The delivery was not the wait all day kind either. I knew when they would be here and they were on time. Very happy and will be back for our future furnishing needs.
